TitlePage.Title: &Modules;
TitlePage.Subtitle: A &homalg; based Package for the Abelian Category of Finitely Presented Modules over Computable Rings
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. The latest version is available online at:
https://homalg-project.github.io/homalg_project/Modules/doc/chap0.html
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
This package is part of the &homalg;-project:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/index.php/core-packages/modules-package
